title: Course on Applying the IPTEACES Framework for Evaluating Corporate e-Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematics Concepts and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Learners from diverse corporate backgrounds participate in a BYOD environment, with an emphasis on learning through solving actual workplace problems.

learning_goals: Apply the 7-stage IPTEACES framework to design e-learning programs
Measure learning effectiveness indicators (achievement, applicability) at over 80% accuracy using project-based assessment tools
Analyze the effectiveness of math-based vocational training programs for heterogeneous learner groups
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
